roleset.name: put data into a system

example.name: all args
example.text: All units must reply according to the format requested by applicants within the time limit and input the reply comments , reply time , and reply format into the Ministry of Agriculture application - based disclosure information processing system as archives for future reference .
example.arg: the repy comments, reply time, and reply format
into the Ministry of Agriculture application - based disclosure information processing system

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in wsj-nw. Framed by Claire
